name: XhtmlJunction
tag_list: xhtmljunction, psd-to-html, psd-to-wordpress, psd-to-xhtml, psd-to-css, psd-to-joomla, psd-to-magento, psd-to-html-conversion
overview:
XhtmlJunction specializes in PSD to HTML conversion and integration with third party CMS applications like wordpress, joomla, drupal, magento, x-cart, zen-cart etc.

The key features of this company are as following:

Quick turnaround: 8 hours They deliver the first html sliced page within 8 hours.

Reasonable rates: $39 Great package, affordable rates, with no hidden charges.

Expertise Producing clean, standards-compliant code for over 6 years and counting. They have a proficient and well-informed team who’ve coded over thousands of web pages.

Excellent communication Easy accessibility through phone, email, instant message, and live chat.

Cross browser compatibility They always check the code manually on all the major browsers like IE 6/7/8, Safari, Firefox, Opera and Chrome.

Cross Operating system compatibility Mandatory checking of code on both Windows and Mac.

W3C Validation Both HTML and CSS would be validated against W3C standards.

Search engine friendly code Special emphasis is laid on loading time, code to content ratio, et al, so the code is search engine optimized.

NDA To maintain the confidentiality of all files and information.

100% satisfaction guarantee 100% satisfaction is guaranteed. They value the feedback of clients and work with clients until eternity to get the clients satisfied.

50% Discount Get a 50% discount on all the inner pages.

Software Integration Integration with 3rd party web applications including Wordpress, Magento, Joomla, Drupal, MovableType, Xcart, ZenCart, and many more.

For more information, you can visit the company website at http://www.xhtmljunction.com.
